an7.68:1.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an7.68:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammannu ca hoti atthannu ca attannu ca mattannu ca kalannu ca parisannu ca puggalaparoparannu ca.
an7.68:2.3: suttam geyyam veyyakaranam gatham udanam itivuttakam jatakam abbhutadhammam vedallam.
an7.68:2.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammam janeyya—
an7.68:2.5: suttam geyyam …pe… abbhutadhammam vedallam, nayidha ‘dhammannu’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:2.6: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammam janati—
an7.68:2.7: suttam geyyam …pe… abbhutadhammam vedallam, tasma ‘dhammannu’ti vuccati.
an7.68:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhasitassa attham janati:
an7.68:3.3: ‘ayam imassa bhasitassa attho, ayam imassa bhasitassa attho’ti.
an7.68:3.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhasitassa attham janeyya:
an7.68:3.5: ‘ayam imassa bhasitassa attho, ayam imassa bhasitassa attho’ti, nayidha ‘atthannu’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:3.6: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhasitassa attham janati:
an7.68:3.7: ‘ayam imassa bhasitassa attho, ayam imassa bhasitassa attho’ti, tasma ‘atthannu’ti vuccati.
an7.68:4.3: ‘ettakomhi saddhaya silena sutena cagena pannaya patibhanena’ti.
an7.68:4.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanam janeyya:
an7.68:4.5: ‘ettakomhi saddhaya silena sutena cagena pannaya patibhanena’ti, nayidha ‘attannu’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:4.6: Yasma ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanam janati:
an7.68:4.7: ‘ettakomhi saddhaya silena sutena cagena pannaya patibhanena’ti, tasma ‘attannu’ti vuccati.
an7.68:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mattam janati civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam patiggahanaya.
an7.68:5.3: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mattam janeyya civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam patiggahanaya, nayidha ‘mattannu’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:5.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mattam janati civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam patiggahanaya, tasma ‘mattannu’ti vuccati.
an7.68:6.3: ‘ayam kalo uddesassa, ayam kalo paripucchaya, ayam kalo yogassa, ayam kalo patisallanassa’ti.
an7.68:6.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalam janeyya:
an7.68:6.5: ‘ayam kalo uddesassa, ayam kalo paripucchaya, ayam kalo yogassa, ayam kalo patisallanassa’ti, nayidha ‘kalannu’ti vucceyya.
an7.68:6.6: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalam janati:
an7.68:6.7: ‘ayam kalo uddesassa, ayam kalo paripucchaya, ayam kalo yogassa, ayam kalo patisallanassa’ti, tasma ‘kalannu’ti vuccati.
an7.68:6.8: Iti dhammannu, atthannu, attannu, mattannu, kalannu.
an7.68:7.3: ‘ayam khattiyaparisa, ayam brahmanaparisa, ayam gahapatiparisa, ayam samanaparisa.
an7.68:7.4: Tattha evam upasankamitabbam, evam thatabbam, evam kattabbam, evam nisiditabbam, evam bhasitabbam, evam tunhi bhavitabban’ti.
an7.68:7.5: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisam janeyya:
an7.68:7.8: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisam janati:
an7.68:7.9: ‘ayam khattiyaparisa, ayam brahmanaparisa, ayam gahapatiparisa, ayam samanaparisa.
an7.68:7.10: Tattha evam upasankamitabbam, evam thatabbam, evam kattabbam, evam nisiditabbam, evam bhasitabbam, evam tunhi bhavitabban’ti, tasma ‘parisannu’ti vuccati.
an7.68:7.11: Iti dhammannu, atthannu, attannu, mattannu, kalannu, parisannu.
an7.68:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dvayena puggala vidita honti.
an7.68:8.4: eko ariyanam dassanakamo, eko ariyanam na dassanakamo.
an7.68:9.2: eko saddhammam sotukamo, eko saddhammam na sotukamo.
an7.68:10.2: eko ohitasoto dhammam sunati, eko anohitasoto dhammam sunati.
an7.68:11.2: eko sutva dhammam dhareti, eko sutva dhammam na dhareti.
an7.68:11.3: Yvayam puggalo sutva na dhammam dhareti,
an7.68:12.2: eko dhatanam dhammanam attham upaparikkhati, eko dhatanam dhammanam attham na upaparikkhati.
an7.68:12.3: Yvayam puggalo dhatanam dhammanam attham na upaparikkhati,
an7.68:12.5: Yvayam puggalo dhatanam dhammanam attham upaparikkhati,
an7.68:13.1: Dve puggala dhatanam dhammanam attham upaparikkhanti—
an7.68:13.2: eko atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno, eko atthamannaya dhammamannaya na dhammanudhammappatipanno.
an7.68:13.3: Yvayam puggalo atthamannaya dhammamannaya na dhammanudhammappatipanno,
an7.68:14.2: eko attahitaya patipanno no parahitaya, eko attahitaya ca patipanno parahitaya ca.
an7.68:14.3: Yvayam puggalo attahitaya patipanno no parahitaya,
an7.68:14.5: Yvayam puggalo attahitaya ca patipanno parahitaya ca,
an7.68:15.1: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dvayena puggala vidita honti.
an7.68:16.2: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti pahuneyyo …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
